alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Greenville; Pickens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 12:32AM EDT until June 12 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina... Northeastern Anderson County in Upstate South Carolina... South central Pickens County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 115 AM EDT. * At 1232 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Clemson, or 5 miles north of Northlake, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Piedmont, Belton, Williamston, Northlake, West Pelzer, Sandy Springs, Pendleton, Donaldson Center, Central and Anderson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
